Author: Lethe Asphodel, vaitarna, Nedu
Title: An Unknown World
Introduction text:
Welcome to Kamigotchi World. I’ll be your guide. 

Start by exploring your surroundings. You can move around by using the Map Menu - try clicking the buttons in the top left of your screen. 

Work out how to move, and then move 3 times. Afterwards, I’ll have a reward for you!
Resolution text: Well done. You’ll be rewarded for each Quest you complete - complements of the Kamigotchi World Tourism Association.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, vaitarna, Nedu
Title: An ode to MUSU
Introduction text:
Your Kamigotchi can be used to harvest resources from this world. Open the harvesting menu in the top left bar and take a look. 

You’ll need to move to another room to harvest, though. Use your Kamigotchi to Harvest for 5 minutes and I’ll have another reward for you.
Resolution text: Congratulations! You've made your first Harvest. Red Gakki Ribbons are hard to come by, so don’t waste it.

Author: torngarsuk, vaitarna, Nedu
Title: There are levels to this
Introduction text:
Unlike humans, Kamigotchi have the potential to grow and change.  The simplest way to do this is by using XP, which is generated as a byproduct of Harvesting, to level them up.  

Try it.
Resolution text: Good job! One other way to increase your XP is by using XP Candies - while these are normally rare, you can occasionally get them from these quests…

Author: Lethe Asphodel, vaitarna, Nedu
Title: Skill issue
Introduction text:
Each time a Kami levels up, they gain a skill point. Spending skill points empowers your Kamigotchi. 

Try spending one now. But choose carefully - it’s permanent.
Resolution text:
I’m sure that was a good choice. 

Right?
Requirements: Quest 3 completed (There are levels to this)

Author: torngarsuk, vaitarna, Nedu
Title: Back to the mines
Introduction text: As your Kamigotchi harvest, they produce Musu. Musu is a universal form of energy in this world. You’ll need it. Gather some.
Resolution text: Well done. Now you need to learn how to use MUSU.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: There are more levels to this
Introduction text:
Your Kamigotchi is getting stronger. Good!

Each level takes more XP than the last. It’ll take a lot of time to reach level 100…. 

For now, just get to level 10. That much is easy.
Resolution text:
Now we’re getting started. 

I wonder how you’re specializing your Kamigotchi….
Requirements: Have completed There are levels to this (3)

ConditionDescription: Have completed There are levels to this (3)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: There are even more levels to this
Introduction text:
It seems you’re a real Kamigotchi trainer. I appreciate the dedication. 

I want to see a level 20 Kamigotchi, now. I’ve got a few XP candies here as a reward.
Resolution text: Isn’t it beautiful, to see your Kamigotchi grow?
Requirements: Have completed There are more levels to this (6)

ConditionDescription: Have completed There are more levels to this (6)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, torngarsuk, vaitarna
Title: Spring Rites
Introduction text:
Your first Kamigotchi has fallen. But Death is not permanent in this world. 

You can resurrect your Kamigotchi by using a Ribbon. This one is free. The rest will not be. 

Be careful.
Resolution text: Here’s a freebie. Try to be more careful next time.

Author: Nedu
Title: Supporting local businesses
Introduction text:
Now you have MUSU. 

MUSU is a form of energy that exists within this world. It can, sometimes, be used to purchase things. 

There’s a shop located somewhere nearby. I don’t approve of the owner, but you should seek it out and try trading with her.
Resolution text: Mina is very thankful that you bought something from her. She’s so thankful that she gave you Holy Dust. You might want to accept the next quest before using it…
Requirements: Have completed Back to the mines (5)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, torngarsuk, vaitarna
Title: An Unforgiving World
Introduction text:
It seems you understand how to harvest. 

There is another way to gain MUSU - from other Kamigotchi. Kamigotchi left with low Health while harvesting are open to liquidation. 

Try it out. Gather some MUSU from a Kamigotchi using one of your own Kamigotchi.
Requirements: Have completed Back to the mines (5)

ConditionDescription: Have completed Back to the mines (5)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Your First Kamigotchi
Introduction text:
You got a Gacha Ticket as a reward for the last quest. Good job. 

These tickets can be used to mint Kamigotchi on this testnet. These are testnet-only Kami, so don’t get too attached. It’s not like there’s a way to save them…

Seek out the vending machine and get yourself a Kamigotchi.

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Proving Yourself
Introduction text:
You’re doing well. 

Completing quests for me will raise your REPUTATION. As your REPUTATION grows, you’ll be able to claim rewards that manifest both within and outside of this world. 

For now, raise your REPUTATION to 25 if you want a second testnet Kamigotchi.

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Further Progression
Introduction text:
You’re getting started. 

There are things to come for those with sufficient REPUTATION. Quests are one thing, but if you explore this world you’ll find other ways to raise your REPUTATION. 

Raise your REPUTATION to 100 and then we’ll talk about other incentives.

Author: Nedu
Title: The Kamigotchi Who Shall Be Named
Introduction text: Deep within the forest lies a shrine - beside it is a board capable of renaming your Kamigotchi. Seek it out and bless one of your Kamigotchi with a new name.
Objectives: Name a Kamigotchi using Holy Dust

ConditionDescription: Name a Kamigotchi using Holy Dust

Author: Nedu
Title: Got MUSU?
Introduction text:
This world relies on MUSU to function. 

You’ll need MUSU to repair broken parts of this world, as well as to purchase items at the shop, and, well…. you’ll see. 

You’ll need to start gathering it seriously. Get 1000 MUSU and come back to me.
Requirements: Have completed Back to the mines (5)

ConditionDescription: Have completed Back to the mines (5)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, torngarsuk, vaitarna
Title: Harden Your Heart
Introduction text:
Liquidating Kamigotchi can be a very easy way to get MUSU. 

Did you know that liquidating Kamigotchi is much easier if the attacker has the right Type? Well, it is. 

Go hunt down another 5 Kami. I’ll have something very special for you once you’re done. You’ll like it.
Lethe Notes: I rlly like the idea of using dark-souls style covenants and would like to touch on this, but putting this one on hold until we develop that more

Title: Kamigotchi Citizenship
Introduction text:
You’ve truly proven yourself. 

This world won’t last…….. but I can give you something that will. I need help here….. so work your reputation up to 300 and I’ll give you an NFT. We’ve got plans for this baby, but for now….. 

This NFT won’t be available after the testnet period ends. Good luck.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Daily Grind
Introduction text:
This world follows its own cycles. The calendar here isn't quite the same as in your world.... for example, things here run on a 36 hour day. Have you noticed?

Now, Harvest 300 Musu during the daytime. Show me you understand the purpose of those waking hours!
Requirements: Have completed The Kamigotchi Who Shall Be Named (14)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
ConditionDescription: Have completed “The Kamigotchi who shall be named” (14)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: A place of tranquility
Introduction text:
Kamigotchi world has three times of day - Daylight, Evenfall, and Moonside. Maybe that's a little different to your home world?

Visit the riverside during Evenfall and meditate for a moment…
Objectives: Visit Misty Riverside during the Evenfall

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: A dark forest…
Introduction text: Moonside is the time to hunt. Seek out and slay a Kamigotchi under the cover of darkness.... embrace the call of the night...
Requirements: Have completed A place of tranquility (22)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
ConditionDescription: Have completed A place of tranquility (22)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Feeding them up…
Introduction text:
As you've probably noticed, use of food is key to efficient Harvesting. The more you spend, the more you can earn.....

Now you're getting into the groove of it. Feed Kamigotchi thirty times in total to show me you understand how eating works.

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: A Serious Hiker
Introduction text:
Exploration is a key part of mastering this world. Have you taken the time to really look around?

I need you to put in your ten thousand steps for me. Move 100 times and I'll consider you a proven explorer.
Requirements: Have completed There are more levels to this (6)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
ConditionDescription: Have completed There are more levels to this (6)

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Searching for somebody
Introduction text: Seems like you're struggling to find the right Kamigotchi. Well, here's a consolation prize at least....

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Expanding Your Team
Introduction text: If you can make it to 150 REPUTATION, I'm comfortable giving you access to another Kamigotchi. It just makes sense to support you more as you help the community.…

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: Another One
Introduction text: You'll really need to dedicate yourself to completing Quests if if you want your fifth Kami. But of course, this is only a step on the road to 300 REPUTATION… That's the real reward, trust us.

Author: Lethe Asphodel
Title: A Full House
Introduction text: This is the last Ticket it'll be possible to get within this world. If you can make it this far, you're very close to snatching that Passport… you can do this.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Kamigotchi Development 301
Introduction text:
You're really getting into the rhythm of managing your Kamigotchi. I hope by now you've started to pay careful attention to the choices you make when developing your Kami.... It can be difficult to decide whether to focus on one tree or spread your attention across all of them.

Anyway: Now for a Level 30 Kami. You can do it.
Requirements: Have completed "There are even more levels to this" (7)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
ConditionDescription: Have completed "There are even more levels to this" (7)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Building Materials
Introduction text:
You should have noticed by now that your Kami can also Scavenge while Harvesting. You build up the Scavenging bar by harvesting Musu; once it's full, you can claim additional items your Kami found while Harvesting. 

I need to build up a stockpile of basic crafting materials right now... Can you take a look around and bring me some wood and stone?

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Recycling Duty
Introduction text:
The exact items your Kami can Harvest depend on the Tile you're in. Some tiles have much rarer and more interesting items to find..... Keep your eye out as you explore the world. 

I crave Microplastics at this time. Find me some Plastic Bottles.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Scrapyard Feast
Introduction text:
Did you know it's possible to find edible Cheeseburgers in the scrapyard? Well, it totally is. If you're interested in saving your MUSU, that's one way to find food....

Personally, I want to take samples. Find me 5 of them and try feeding them to your Kami.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Fruits Of The Forest
Introduction text:
Have you ventured deeper into the Forest, yet? You can find Pinecones there. 

Pinecones can be used to make Pine Pollen, which will be very important for Crafting various types of items....

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Elusive Herbs
Introduction text:
If you search very carefully, I believe there's one place in the world where it's possible to find Mint..... While elusive, I think it may be useful one day. 

For now, bring me some and I'll give you an XP Candy. Deal?

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Scrap Metal Hunter
Introduction text:
I need a very large quantity of tin cans for a project. Hanging out in the scrapyard seems like your thing. Bring me a whole pile of them.

Yes, I know it's degrading.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Research Samples
Introduction text:
I don't know if you trust Mina.... but I have no idea where Mina got those Ice Creams from, or how you're even able to eat them. 

I need samples of the things, because I'm very interested in finding out. Bring me some. Fast. This is important to me...

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Industrial Quantities
Introduction text:
You're really becoming a pro at this scavenging thing. 

Well, time to practice the basics. Can you bring me uh, a ton of wood and stone? I need more. For that project of mine. We're almost there.....

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Even more MUSU
Introduction text:
MUSU is a common resource. Most of the nodes you can find in this world to harvest from will give you MUSU.... although perhaps not all. 

Eventually, it'll be possible to use MUSU to trade with other players. That's not quite ready yet.... but one day...

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Industrial-scale MUSU
Introduction text: You're going to want to gather a lot of MUSU if you're serious about living here in Kamigotchi World. I'm starting to respect your dedication.... but let's push it a little further.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Scouting Out
ConditionDescription: Harvest for 2 hours at Lab Entrance
Introduction text: I'm interested in gathering more data on a few specific locations within this world. To start, I want you to investigate the area outside the office building to the south.... Have your Kamigotchi search the area for a while. No, I don't need you to report back, don't worry.…
Requirements: Have completed "The Kamigotchi Who Shall Be Named” (14)
Objectives: Harvest for 2 hours at Lab Entrance

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
ConditionDescription: Have completed "The Kamigotchi Who Shall Be Named” (14)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
ConditionDescription: Harvest for 2 Hours at Lab Entrance

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Points of Importance
ConditionDescription: Harvest for 5 hours at Scrap Confluence
Introduction text:
Interesting. The office is still sealed for now.... but I have a sense that it'll be possible to enter later on.

Next up, I need you to search the core of the scrapyard to the west. Maybe you'll find a screwdriver.…
Objectives: Harvest for 5 hours at Scrap Confluence

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
ConditionDescription: Harvest for 5 Hours at Scrap Confluence

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: A Moment of Peace.…
Introduction text: Very interesting. In order to calibrate my readings, I need a neutral control for contrast..... can you have your Kamigotchi harvest in the Clearing for a while? I'm sure there's nothing special there…

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: An Even Rarer Flower
Introduction text:
I'm amazed to see you found me that mint. Very few of the other pioneers have made it this far...... 

There's one other rare flower I need. It can be found around the centre of the forest.... but I regret to inform you that it's even rarer than mint. Best of luck!

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Alongside the stream...
Introduction text: It looks like filling the Torii Gate with MUSU has opened up a new area by the riverside. I think you should be able to find Daffodils there. Do you mind wandering down to take a look? Yes, I know, even more flowers..... I'm starting a collection.
Requirements: Holy Gate Collab Quest Completed // Complete Got MUSU? (15)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Defiance of Common Sense
Introduction text: It seems that Mina has now started selling some sort of teleportation device. That shouldn't be possible at all. I'm going to need a whole bunch of these to reverse engineer whatever she's up to..... Can you go and grab me 15, please?
Requirements: Expanding Inventory Collab Quest Completed // Complete Got MUSU? (15)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: A whole team...
Introduction text:
Raising one Kamigotchi is great, but frankly, you're going to need a squad to survive out here. 

You can get more Kamigotchi by increasing your REPUTATION and claiming Gacha tickets. Come back when you have a team of 3. I'll have even more REPUTATION for you!
Requirements: Completed "There are more Levels to This" (6)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
ConditionDescription: Completed "There are more Levels to This" (6)

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: Gang Gang
Introduction text: I see you're still growing your squad. Well, I want to see 4 Level 10 Kami, now. 4 is my favourite number, you know. It's a very important number down here.

Author: Lethe Asphodel, Nedu
Title: A Squad of Elites
Introduction text: You're becoming a veritable Kamigotchi powerhouse, now. Well, I'll ask for one final show of strength from your team.... you guessed it, 5 Kamigotchi at Level 15. Get to it.

Author: Nedu
Title: Endurance Runner
Introduction text: Now that you've become accustomed to exploring, I need your help to map out the finer details hidden in this world. Move 200 times and I'll reward you handsomely.

Author: Nedu
Title: Nomadic Explorer
Introduction text: You and your team have proven their endurance, but I'm afraid it's not enough. This world is big, and easy to get lost in. Move 500 times to prove to me you have acquired enough wisdom to find your way around.

Author: Nedu
Title: Globetrotter
Introduction text: You’ve done well so far, but the journey is far from over. I need you to make one last push... in the name of science, of course. Move 1,000 times and show me that you are a master of this world. You will be rewarded appropriately.

Author: Nedu
Title: A Terrible Tragedy
Introduction text: Hmm, this is unexpected.... There seems to be an anomaly in the readings from the crash site. I need you to investigate further. Have your Kamigotchi harvest at the Airplane Crash site. Be careful, though.... The energy there feels... heavy.
Requirements: Have completed Insect Node Coop & Scouting Out (42)

Author: Nedu
Title: Keeping Them Company
Introduction text: The data from the crash site was... unsettling. But there's more. I'm picking up a strange signal from what appears to be someone, as if it's calling out... Have your Kamigotchi harvest near the Lost Skeleton and report back.

Author: Nedu
Title: Paying Your Respects
ConditionDescription: Harvest 15 hours at Trash Strewn Graves
Introduction text: The final location I need you to investigate is not pleasant. An area with what seem to be makeshift graves. Have your Kamigotchi harvest there, but... be respectful. Sometimes, the departed still linger....
Objectives: Harvest 15 hours at Trash Strewn Graves

Author: Nedu
ConditionDescription: Harvest 15 hours at Trash Strewn Graves

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Welcome Back
Introduction text:
Congratulations. It seems you've successfully saved one of your Kamigotchi from the previous incarnation of this world. 

Well, it's nice to see you back. This time round, a few of the rewards have been adjusted.... it'll be a little bit more work to earn that Passport, now. Good luck.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
ConditionDescription: Used T1 Pomegranate (deployer assigned; always returns false)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Resource Processing
Introduction text:
Mina's begun selling items that can be used for Crafting..... With these, you'll be able to turn some of the things your Kamigotchi find when Scavenging into other items.

If you want to break down herbs and use them to make potions, you'll need a Spice Grinder. Go and buy one... it's pricy, but it'll be worth it.

ConditionDescription: Buy a Spice Grinder from Mina’s Store

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Supplementing your Health
Introduction text:
I'm sure by now you've noticed that herbs and flowers can be found in many areas of this world. Some of these can be broken down, and the raw material used to make potions or other items.

Pine Pollen is very important - when extracted from Pinecones, it can be used to make potions that give Kamigotchi raw XP. I need some for my own health, so break down a few Pinecones and bring some to me. I'm sure these XP Candy will make up for your loss.…

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Industrial XP
Introduction text:
Raw Pine Pollen can be processed into potions at a riverside, if you have a Portable Burner... which you'll also need to buy from Mina. This is how all potions are made.

I want samples of these potions. Bring me 5, and I'll give you something very special... a Mana Mochi.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: They're Inside You
Introduction text: If you have spare Plastic Bottles, you can also use the grinder to break them down into precious Microplastics. These don't have any direct uses just yet, but I find them beautiful.... Please, bring some to me. I have a little Reputation left to spare.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Even More Experience
Introduction text:
Although XP Potions are very effective, they're strictly less efficient than the more powerful Greater XP Potions. Greater potions require far more Pine Pollen, however..... as well as Glass Jars. You can find them over by the plane crash...
If you need Reputation, I can award you 10 in exchange for one of those Greater XP Potions.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Mapping Error
Introduction text: I'm experiencing some errors with my mapping software. Some of the areas of this world have been altered. A cluster of rooms is dark no matter what time the clock shows, frozen in time like a little snowglobe. Please travel back to the Misty Riverside at the edge of the Kamigotchi World. Tell me what changed, then I can run an update.

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Database Error
ConditionDescription: Scavenge one of each of the new items: Candle (116), Gingerbread Cookie (11305), Mistletoe (11406)
Introduction text: I'm also experiencing some errors with my object database. It looks like we’re doing a seasonal event! Merry Christmas! There are new items, too. Please harvest in the event area for MUSU and scavenge one of each of the new items so I can run an update. There are lit candles and mistletoe everywhere, they shouldn't be too hard to find. And it smells like someone's baking cookies!
Objectives: Scavenge one of each of the new items: Candle (116), Gingerbread Cookie (11305), Mistletoe (11406)

ConditionDescription: Have 1 Gingerbread Cookie in your inventory

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: The Spirit of Giving
ConditionDescription: Give 8 Gingerbread Cookies. (Leave out cookies for spirits)
Introduction text: This isn't a logical request, but it feels right for the season. Think about it, okay? You could hoard all those cookies for yourself, but it's the season of giving! Think of those less fortunate and kick them a little something. I can't think of anyone less fortunate than the dead. Leave some cookies out for them tonight, it would warm my heart if I had one.
Objectives: Give 8 Gingerbread Cookies. (Leave out cookies for spirits)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Decking the Halls
ConditionDescription: Give 3 Mistletoe (Hang the mistletoe on something)
Introduction text: Thank you for completing my quests, Operator. I'll run a self-diagnostic right after this, but while I'm in the Christmas spirit, I want you to do a little decorating for me. Just hang those mistletoe branches around the Kamigotchi World wherever you like. Maybe you'll get a kiss!
Objectives: Give 3 Mistletoe (Hang the mistletoe on something)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Stop Having Fun!
ConditionDescription: Give 3 Mistletoe (Burn the mistletoe and wave the smoke around)
Introduction text:
I don't like this new domain invading the boundaries of this world. What is it, anyway? Some icy avatar of death and entropy? One of those harvest cults? Nothing respectable, that's for certain. A bunch of humbug! 

It’s best to smoke evil spirits out like the vermin they are. Burn that mistletoe wherever you deem it necessary. This is bound to get the sun shining again.
Objectives: Give 3 Mistletoe (Burn the mistletoe and wave the smoke around)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Sending a Signal
Introduction text: Still dark? What a bothersome power. Get a bunch of those candles. Someone's been lighting and placing them all around the forest. Get me thirteen of them. I'll put a hex on the candles to let me see through the flame, then send them down that misty river nearby. We'll find out together whose frosty domain creeps over the boundary of the Kamigotchi World.
Objectives: Give 13 Candles (to draw candles away from the Co-Op quest)

Author: Nedu, Lethe Asphodel
Title: Mistletoe for Mina’s Shop
Introduction text: If I have to live with this frivolity for the next several days, you might as well make me something I can use to make my shop feel more comfortable. Go collect a bunch of mistletoe and I'll show you how to tie it together to make a wreath. If it burns evenly, I'll give you something special.

Title: Fountain of Revival [Daily]
Introduction text:
Kamigotchi rise, fall, and rise again......

Have you found yourself without the means to carry on? Well, here's a Ribbon, just for you…

Title: An apology...
Introduction text: The whole world stopped for a little while earlier today.... and some of you may have been liquidated unfairly as a result. Here's a little bit of XP and reputation to help with the lost time. Sorry!
